QuestData.Title: Up and Running
QuestData.Description: The Warsong struck us hard. We lost Telaar, but we have a rare opportunity to strike at the heart of the Warsong.$B$BWe need your wisdom and leadership to pull it off, $n.$B$BFirst though, we're going to get our survivors out of Telaar. My rangari are ready to strike. We just need to get you to them.$B$BThaelin has a copter that can get you to them. Unfortunately, his hands are full just trying to keep the infernal thing running.$B$BHelp him get it up and running?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Assorted Engineering Parts, Prop Rotor, and Transmission Flywheel.
QuestData.CompletionText: $n, I can't tell you how great it is to see you.
QuestData.RewardText: For me? Really you shouldn't have.$B$BOkay, this should do it.$B$BI hope.
